DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the incidence of misuse, i.e., over-use and under-use, of Budesonide/formoterol for maintenance and reliever therapy in usual-care setting.
DOC.brief_title: Budesonide/Formoterol for Maintenance and Reliever Therapy Among Asthma Patients in Thailand
DOC.criteria: Established persistent asthma Currently treated with Symbicort SMART for 3 months or longer currently participating or have participated in a study with an investigational compound within the last 30 days current diagnosis of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) smoked more than 10 packyear
